name: Cowboy vs Zombies
description:
Oh no! zombies have taken over the wild west, how long can a lowly cowboy last? o:
Made in 10ish hours for Miz Jam 1

Devlog Now Posted Here!

going fullscreen kinda messes with the ui and if you downloaded the game run it in 1366x768 or the ui is broken D:
